questions.question: Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
Set in a samurai country closed off from the world, this arc features a rebellion against a Shogun and an Emperor of the Sea. What is...?

This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
